timeline.message: interop-testing: add flags to xds test client

timeline.bodyText:
Is there an easy way for the client to read both resp.Hostname and the hostname from header?
This will be necessary if we want to merge this PR before updating the test server image to send hostname in headers.
timeline.author: menghanl

replies.bodyText: Easy enough but it will make the code a bit cluttered and doesn't seem necessary - the server will be backwards compatible itself so we can just update the server image prior to merging, right? If that's more complicated than I think, then I can add a fallback here with a TODO to remove it.
replies.author: ericgribkoff

timeline.message: Use async API, do not fail on failed rpc

timeline.author: dapengzhang0
dapengzhang0

               + c.printResponse
-              + "\n  --qps=INT              Qps per channel. Default: "

               + c.qps
+              + "\n  --rpc=STR              Types of RPCs to make, ',' separated string. RPCs can "
